HeroText: Nature awakens our senses, transporting us to magical places where we can hear our inner voice.
IntroText:
Here there is no rush,
only space to feel and listen.

We gather 
to remember a sacred truth:
the journey outward
is the path that leads us inward,
to the soul dwelling within our bodies,
in every emotion opening to be understood and honored.
We are emotions, we are tribe.

Here we honor the pain,
embrace what vibrates,
and release what we no longer are.
We love. We feel.
We walk in truth.
